Flow.description: EPH-5120, US-0007313 - [AU]Assignment for AU Outreach Campaigns; US-0009158 - [Hypercare] [AU] [Deals] Send Deal Contract email to the seller when changing the status to Planned, US-0009960, US-0010597 - Move Time-Base Deal Process Builder to Time-Base Deal Flow, [DE-Deals-Fulfillment] Flag to Identify the fulfillment Invite Deals/ Few BU Feedback, US-0012108 - Update condition for DE Rejection email notification

value.stringValue:
or(isnew(), ISCHANGED([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c))
&& Text([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) ="Planned"
&& [EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Subsidy__c >0
&& or( [EBH_Deal__c].Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c ="DE", and( TEXT([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_DealSiteId__c) = "77", [EBH_Deal__c].Fulfillment__c = true ) )

or(isnew(), ISCHANGED([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) )&& Text([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) ="Planned" && [EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Subsidy__c <=0 && or( [EBH_Deal__c].Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c ="DE", and( TEXT([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_DealSiteId__c) = "77", [EBH_Deal__c].Fulfillment__c = true ) )

or(isnew(), ISCHANGED([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) )&& Text([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) ="Planned" && [EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Subsidy__c <=0 && or( [EBH_Deal__c].Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c ="DE", and( TEXT([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_DealSiteId__c) = "77", [EBH_Deal__c].Fulfillment__c = true ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5_pmetrule
formulas.expression: or(isnew(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.EBH_Status__c}) )&& Text({!myVariable_old.EBH_Status__c}) ="Planned" && {!myVariable_old.EBH_Subsidy__c} <=0 && or( {!myVariable_old.Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c} ="DE", and( TEXT({!myVariable_old.EBH_DealSiteId__c}) = "77", {!myVariable_old.Fulfillment__c} = true ) )

value.stringValue:
or( isnew(), ISCHANGED([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) ) && Text([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Status__c) ="Rejected" && [EBH_Deal__c].EBH_Don_t_send_email_to_sellers__c = false && or( [EBH_Deal__c].Seller_Growth_Portal_Culture__c = "DE" , and( TEXT([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_DealSiteId__c) = "77", [EBH_Deal__c].Fulfillment__c = true ), and( TEXT([EBH_Deal__c].EBH_DealSiteId__c) = "77", [EBH_Deal__c].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = "DE - Seller Portal" )
)
